features.title: Performance
features.description: State-of-the-art performance for both convex (linear dynamics) and nonlinear trajectory optimization problems.

features.title: Interface
features.description: Convenient interface for dynamics and problem definition via TrajectoryOptimization.jl and RobotDynamics.jl.

features.title: Nonlinear state
features.description: Supports generic nonlinear state and control constraints at each time step.

features.title: Trajectories
features.description: Allows initialization of both state and control trajectories.

features.title: Integration
features.description: Supports integration up to 4th-order Runge-Kutta methods. Higher-order methods are possible but not yet implemented

features.title: 3D Rotations
features.description: Supports optimization on the space of 3D rotations.

features.title: Efficient Methods
features.description: Provides efficient methods for auto-differentiation of costs, constraints, and dynamics via ForwardDiff.jl and FiniteDiff.jl.

graphContent.title: ALTRO beats most solvers.
graphContent.description: ALTRO has demonstrated state-of-the-art performance for convex conic MPC problems, beating SOCP solvers such as Mosek, ECOS, and SCS. For quadratic MPC problems, ALTRO has performance on-par or better than OSQP.
